title: Spiral Wars
outcome: Several free zone councils secretly turn the spiral overrides into weapons, sabotaging each other’s BCI scoring to gain advantage. As chaos grows and resource distribution falters, Oksana Lintz and Nikola Petrak must broker an uneasy truce to halt Stenograd’s slide toward civil cyber-war and societal collapse.

events.description: Reports of deliberate BCI sabotage emerge as some free zone councils manipulate scoring to block rivals from vital resources.
Distrust spreads as neighborhoods accuse each other of abusing the spiral override. Protests and counter-protests erupt over job assignments and food distribution.
Oksana Lintz and Nikola Petrak quietly negotiate with zone leaders, proposing a temporary halt to all overrides in order to stabilize essential services.
A fragile truce is reached: councils agree to transparent BCI adjustments and mutual oversight, halting the sabotage as citizens demand a return to cooperation.
